thread.title: Britain upholds Julian Assange's arrest warrant

title: Britain upholds Julian Assange's arrest warrant
text:
Britain upholds Julian Assange's arrest warrant 8:48pm IST - 01:13 
WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange lost a legal bid on Tuesday to persuade the British authorities not to pursue any further action against him for breaching his bail conditions when he walked into the Ecuadorean embassy in 2012.   
WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange lost a legal bid on Tuesday to persuade the British authorities not to pursue any further action against him for breaching his bail conditions when he walked into the Ecuadorean embassy in 2012.  //reut.rs/2ssDWWm
